contents.text: Welcome to Naytev, your San Francisco based secret weapon for Facebook and Instagram A/B testing.
For support with your A/B testing campaigns, press 1.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold and we will connect you to our technical support team shortly.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting a tracking error in my A/B testing setup.
I need help fixing my Facebook split test—it won’t show any results for my veteran outreach campaign.
Troubleshoot API authentication failure when calling the Facebook A/B test endpoint.
I’m having trouble getting my Facebook ad A/B test to run correctly.
My A/B test campaign for our department’s event isn’t recording any results in the dashboard; can you help me troubleshoot it?

contents.text: For account management and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold and we will connect you to our billing and account specialists shortly.

navigationGoals: I need to update my billing info and review last month’s charges.
I have a question about a recent charge on my Naytev subscription for my veteran-run nonprofit.
Clarify my current subscription tier limits and audit recent billing charges.
I need help understanding my invoice and charges.
I need to update the billing information on my student group’s Naytev subscription and review last month’s charges.

contents.text: For sales and new business inquiries, press 2.
For product demos and trial setup assistance, press 1.
Please hold and we will connect you with a sales representative for demos and trials.

navigationGoals: I need help setting up a trial account and scheduling a product demo.
I’d like to set up a trial and get a demo of your testing tool for my veteran support advertisements.
Request a developer-focused demo of the REST API and webhooks for trial setup.
I’d like to see a demo and set up a trial for your service.
I’d like to start a free trial to experiment with A/B testing features on our upcoming physics seminar promotion.

contents.text: For partnership opportunities and marketing collaborations, press 2.
Please hold and we will connect you with our partnerships and media inquiry team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss partnership opportunities with your team.
I’m looking to partner with Naytev on a marketing campaign for my veteran community program.
Discuss integrating Naytev’s split-test SDK into our analytics platform as a partner.
I’m interested in exploring a marketing partnership with your company.
I’m organizing a physics outreach project on campus and want to explore partnering with Naytev for co-marketing opportunities.
